## action.ShouldActDetail interface

Detailed information on why an action should be taken.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface ShouldActDetail 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [act](./cloud.action.shouldactdetail.act.md) | <code>boolean</code> | True if the action should be performed. |
